attributes.action: Make st georges day a bank holiday and to celebrate with fireworks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people of england, shout it loud shout it proud celebrate st georges day with fireworks to let the rest of the world know you are proud to be english. and make st george the saint of fireworks.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/billyandgeorge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
